metadata.name: Friends Like These
metadata.description:
After his relationship falls apart, Sal and his two best friends decide to rent a house on the island, in an attempt to get him out of his slump. The girls' attempt to help Sal results in excessive drinking, late nights, and mild debauchery. An independent movie filmed in Canada and directed by Zoran Drageli.

The movie is available to watch commercially on Amazon, Tubi, YouTube, and now for the first time as a collectible NFT on the blockchain. That film NFT is limited to 25 editions only.  
This is a unique version of the feature film that contains a message from the director giving thanks to the collector of this NFT.

Renderyard has created a way for the collectors of NFTs to directly support independent filmmakers that are emerging as new talents in the industry. Allowing the film director to have a direct way to identify the holder of each NFT. And see who has supported them throughout their career from the very beginning.

[2019] - 53 min    
Drama, Comedy  
Director Zoran Dragelj﻿

Starring﻿﻿ Josh Romyn, David Laurence, Kiran Madahar, Jillian Zavazal, Matreya Scarrwener

Rating PG-13
